ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Hello, new bard (level 3) and well met to all!
ygData.msgSnippet: What do you mean, switching it back?  Back to the way assist was before the last patch?  That didn t really affect this macro.  The /pet atack is needed
ygData.messageBody:
What do you mean, switching it back? Back to the way assist was before the
last patch? That didn't really affect this macro. The /pet atack is needed
because some pets don't start attacking their new targets when you recharm
them. You can tell your pet to start taunting? I never knew that.

----- Original Message -----
From: "John Grady" <john_grady@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, April 09, 2001 5:39 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Hello, new bard (level 3) and well met to all!


> One comment on your macro Matt. Since VI is changing assist back again,
> the seperate /pet attack command isn't needed right? How about
> substituting /pet taunt to try to reduce the damage to your party.
>
> Tzeetch
>
